name: Phantom Limb
description:
This is a game crafted and baked during the #asylumjam2016 :)

http://www.asylumjam.com/
The optionnal theme was "escape room".

As a player, you have to pick up that damn tube ticket (E key) and follow the path through wicked memories.

This ain't a game about mental illness. It is a game about loss and guilt.
And the main character is kinda trapped...

We hope you enjoy it !
